pages.title: Lighten Up
pages.text: Iron... Gold... Both are useful metals in their own right, but lack many of the properties necessary to practice some of the more refined magicks. Most others were lost, but with $(thing)Mana Powder$(), it should be possible to recreate small quantities of them. For now, let's prioritize $(item)Copper$() and $(item)Lead$().

pages.heading: Copper Transmutation
pages.description: Requires a pool of at least $(thing)6 buckets$() of $(item)Liquid Mana$()

pages.heading: Lead Transmutation
pages.description: Requires a pool of at least $(thing)6 buckets$() of $(item)Liquid Mana$()
